example: "Subtraction and Contraction: Deleuze, Immanence and Matter and Memory," in Collapse, vol.
example_meaning: II: Speculative Realism. - Loại trừ và Rút gọn: Deleuze, sự nội tại và Vật chất và ký ức (Subtraction and Contraction: Deleuze, Immanence and Matter and Memory), trong Collapse, vol.
definition: Naturally part of something; existing throughout and within something; inherent; integral; intrinsic; indwelling.

example: ‘I understand your father is something of a philatelist ,’ he said suddenly, looking unconcernedly off towards the farm.
example_meaning: “Ta biết bố cháu là một nhà sưu tầm tem ,” ông ta đột nhiên nói và hờ hững nhìn về phía nông trang.
definition: A person who studies stamps.
A person who has a fondness for wine. A person who has learned to appreciate wine.

example: I want you to bear in mind my desire to avoid all questions.
example_meaning: Tôi muốn anh lưu ý đến mong muốn của tôi là không phải nghe hỏi thêm điều gì.
definition: More formal or stronger word for want.

example: Blatant display of hostility, inconsequential display of affection or feigned ignorance.
example_meaning: Biểu hiện về mặt thì địch không biểu hiện tình cảm hoặc giả vờ không biết.
definition: The act of affecting or acting upon; the state of being affected.

example: John would become a "connoisseur of jewels", building up a large collection, and became famous for his opulent clothes and also, according to French chroniclers, for his fondness for bad wine.
example_meaning: John là một người "sành đồn trang sức", đã có một bộ sưu tập lớn, và trở nên nổi tiếng với những bộ quần áo lộng lẫy vã cũng có thể, theo biên niên sử của Pháp, là sự cả tin vào những loại rượu dỏm.
definition: the quality of being fond
Characterized by or pertaining to bathos.

example: You talking about the corny brother with the Cosby sweater and the Dumbo ears?
example_meaning: Cậu đang nói đến cái gã cũ rích với chiếc áo len và đôi khuyên tai à?
definition: Insipid or trite.

example: Sticky stacks of golden, syrupy deliciousness!
example_meaning: Một cái bánh quế màu vàng thật là ngon !
definition: Having the taste or consistency of syrup.
(of a liquid) thick and sticky

example: I was all naked and all drippy .

definition: dripping or tending to drip.

example: That " s no reason to just dump the kid!

definition: A place where waste or garbage is left; a ground or place for dumping ashes, refuse, etc.

example: He rejected all the objections.
example_meaning: Anh ấy bác bỏ mọi ý kiến phản đối.

example: So, you're Mr. Concord now?
example_meaning: Vậy giờ anh là anh chàng Concord à?
definition: A state of agreement; harmony; union.

example: So , he tested the effects of music on the cardiovascular system .

definition: Relating to the circulatory system, that is the heart and blood vessels.

example: "Nitric oxide and cardiopulmonary hemodynamics in Tibetan highlanders".
example_meaning: Truy cập 8 tháng 3 năm 2015. ^ “Nitric oxide and cardiopulmonary hemodynamics in Tibetan highlanders”.
definition: Of or pertaining to both the heart and the lungs.

example: VO2 max is widely used as an indicator of cardiorespiratory fitness.
example_meaning: VO2 max được sử dụng rộng rãi như một chỉ số về sức khỏe.
definition: pertaining to the heart and breathing

example: * Electrocardiography ( EKG ) .

definition: (cardiology) The curve drawn or traced by an electrocardiograph.

example: There's cavalry, men on horseback and with chariots .

definition: a two-wheeled, horse-drawn vehicle, used in Bronze Age and Early Iron Age warfare

example: Tom spent a lot of time trying to learn how to play the French horn.

definition: An attempt.

example: Now, it's not as if it's all rosy in the marital bed either.

example: ▪ Prepare a brief presentation that features one Bible text along with one paragraph in a publication.

definition: Of short duration; happening quickly. [from 15th c.]

example: The Rococo style spread with French artists and engraved publications.
example_meaning: Các phong cách Rococo lây lan với nghệ sĩ Pháp và các ấn phẩm khắc.

example: The sun is about to descend into the roseate waters of the Sacred River.

example: for example, giving them a good deal of autonomy

definition: (philosophy) The capacity to make an informed, uncoerced decision.

example_meaning: Dùng phép loại suy , hãy thử nghĩ về khái niệm về sức khỏe thân thể.
definition: A relationship of resemblance or equivalence between two situations, people, or objects, especially when used as a basis for explanation or extrapolation.

example: My agency was bidding for a big account, and they got it.
example_meaning: Cơ quan tớ vừa trúng một gói thầu lớn.
definition: (transitive) To issue a command; to tell.

example: The archiving of imperial constitutions facilitated the task of jurists in referring to legal precedents.

definition: a judge

example: Your account may not have permission to access the specified resource

definition: (transitive) To state explicitly, or in detail, or as a condition.

example: And I'm also trying to create a means in which to step outside our quotidian experience of time and to start to consider a deeper timescale.
example_meaning: Và tôi tìm ra cách để chúng ta vượt qua những trải nghiệm thời gian quen thuộc và có cái nhìn sâu xa hơn về thời gian.
definition: (medicine) Recurring every twenty-four hours or (more generally) daily (of symptoms etc.). [from 14th c.]

example: He flips it, makes it, there's nothing pastiche whatsoever about it.

definition: A work of art, drama, literature, music, or architecture that imitates the work of a previous artist.
